spec_data.Name: R-expm
spec_data.Description:
Efficient calculation of the exponential of a matrix. The package
contains an R interface and a C API that package authors can use.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 02:43:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Computation of the matrix exponential and related quantities
